relation: Treatment with Peginterferon alfa-2a 90 mcg administered once weekly for an additional 42 months
Stop any peginterferon alfa-2a/ribavirin therapy and followed prospectively for an additional 42 months without treatment
pageTitle: Long Term Interferon for Patients Who Did Not Clear Hepatitis C Virus With Standard Treatment - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
